edits.oldString: subtitle: 'A guided, guideline-based diagnostic engine and decision support tool for clinicians treating patients with fatigue, dizziness, brain-fog, or palpitations.',
edits.newString: subtitle: 'An educational training tool for learning evidence-based criteria for ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS. For healthcare education and training purposes only.'

edits.oldString: disclaimer: 'This tool is for educational purposes only and does not replace professional medical judgment or clinical evaluation',
edits.newString: disclaimer: 'EDUCATIONAL TOOL ONLY - This open-source training tool is designed for healthcare education and training purposes only. It is NOT a medical device and must NOT be used for patient care, diagnosis, or treatment decisions. Always consult qualified medical professionals for patient care.'

edits.oldString: description: 'VisibleDx is an evidence-based educational tool for ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS. It implements validated criteria from leading medical organizations to educate healthcare professionals in systematic evaluation.',
edits.newString: description: 'VisibleDx is an open-source educational training tool for learning about ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS criteria. Designed exclusively for healthcare education, training, and research purposes - NOT for patient care or medical use.'
